name: Barfly
description:
An adaptation of John Shirley and William Gibson’s short story The Belonging Kind for the 2019 #PowerPointGameJam. 

Originally envisioned as this Snatcher-looking 16-bit adventure, it evolved into liberal use of PowerPoint's own tools of image searching and effects to make the best of my very scarce time for development. I also think there is value in using the software as much as possible since it is the star of the jam.

To avoid missing the deadline for submission, so far this is an unpolished demo that goes up to the first cliffhanger. If there is enough interest I'd like to finish it.
